author: cecilecaillol
body:
#### PR description:

This is the 2nd PR to port all L1T Phase-2 developments to cms-sw. This PR targets the demonstrator tools for the L1 boars. It includes several PRs made locally, the details of which can be found in the twiki https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/view/CMSPublic/SWGuideL1TPhase2Instructions and in the cms-l1t-offline branch.
title: Phase-2 L1: code for L1 demonstrators
